import sys


class Lecandy:
	def getItems(self):
		return [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split()]

	def solve(self):
		T = input()
		for i in xrange(T):
			N,C = map(int , raw_input().split())
			A = self.getItems() 
			for i in xrange(N):
				C-=A[i]
				if C < 0:
					result = i-1
					break
				if C == 0:
					result  = i
					break

				result = i
			
			if result == N-1:
				print "Yes"
			else:
				print "No"


if __name__ == '__main__':
	lecandy = Lecandy()
	lecandy.solve()
